answer:
Please contact the health care provider that gave the vaccines directly to request a copy of the records. Depending on where you live in BC, it would have been your local health unit or doctor's office.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:

Depending on where you live in BC, it would have been your local health unit or doctor's office.
Immunization Nurse
question: I want to know if my daughter got her 18 month old shot it isnt recorded in her passport thanks
question_variation_1: how old is my daughter if she got shot
question_variation_2: is it recorded in passport if kid got shot
